attributes.action: Convince LG Electronics to release the LG Lollipop mobile phone to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For those of you whom are aware, the LG Lollipop mobile phone is currently available to the Korean market.

This petition is for people whom wish the LG Lollipop mobile phone to be made available to people in the UK.

In signing this petition, you will help convince LG Electronics to release the Lollipop mobile phone in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
